property.description: Duration internal services will suspend for

property.description: Telnet Server only creates this packet pool if 'Òption negotiation' is enabled

constraint.display: Value must be a non-negative integer

property.description: Telnet Server only creates this packet pool if NX_TELNET_SERVER_OPTION_DISABLE

constraint.display: Value must be a non-negative integer

config.content: #if (!${config.el.nxd_telnet_server_v2.telnet_server_option}) #define NX_TELNET_SERVER_OPTION_DISABLE #endif #if (${config.el.nxd_telnet_server_v2.user_create_packet_pool}) #define NX_TELNET_SERVER_USER_CREATE_PACKET_POOL #endif #define NX_TELNET_SERVER_PRIORITY (${config.el.nxd_telnet_server_v2.priority}) #define NX_TELNET_MAX_CLIENTS (${config.el.nxd_telnet_server_v2.max_client}) #define NX_TELNET_SERVER_WINDOW_SIZE (${config.el.nxd_telnet_server_v2.control_window_size}) #define NX_TELNET_SERVER_TIMEOUT (${config.el.nxd_telnet_server_v2.server_timeout} * NX_IP_PERIODIC_RATE) #define NX_TELNET_ACTIVITY_TIMEOUT (${config.el.nxd_telnet_server_v2.server_activity_timeout} * NX_IP_PERIODIC_RATE) #define NX_TELNET_TIMEOUT_PERIOD (${config.el.nxd_telnet_server_v2.server_timeout_period} * NX_IP_PERIODIC_RATE) #define NX_TELNET_SERVER_PACKET_PAYLOAD (${config.el.nxd_telnet_server_v2.packet_payload}) #define NX_TELNET_SERVER_PACKET_POOL_SIZE (${config.el.nxd_telnet_server_v2.packet_pool_size})

constraint.display: Module instances must have unique names
Name must be a valid C symbol
Value must be a non-negative integer and divisible by 8
